what is your surname?/(May I ask) your surname?
two-character surname such as 司馬|司马 or 諸葛|诸葛

only the official is allowed to light the fire/Gods may do what cattle may not/quod licet Iovi, non licet bovi
pinyin: zhi3 xu3 zhou1 guan1 fang4 huo3 , bu4 xu3 bai3 xing4 dian3 deng1
containing_words.word: 只許州官放火，不許百姓點燈

definition: having same given name and family name
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan

sentences.english: Greeting with Iranian, you need to address their surname with their academic or job title.
sentences.chinese: 和伊朗人打招呼，要稱他們的姓加上學術或職務頭銜。

sentences.english: A practitioner surnamed Zheng, from a county of Heilongjiang, still practices Falun Gong secretly.
sentences.chinese: 一名來自黑龍江某縣姓鄭的練習者仍然在祕密練功。

sentences.english: A surgeon asked him what's his surname.
sentences.chinese: 一名外科醫生問他姓什麼。

sentences.english: My English teacher is Miss Xing.
Hello, I'm Jean Zhou. What's your family name?
sentences.chinese: 你好，我叫周瓊。你姓什麼？

sentences.english: The man surnamed Huo operated a private studio in Quanjiao county.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，男子姓霍，在全椒縣經營一傢俬人工作室。

sentences.english: Chin Shihhuang, also named Yingzheng , is the founder of the Qin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇，姓贏名政，是秦朝的開國皇帝。

sentences.english: Locke's (Mandarin) Chinese family name is Luo.
sentences.chinese: 如果按照普通話，駱家輝的中國姓爲駱。

sentences.english: Had a Mexican last name, but I don't judge people, you know?
sentences.chinese: 會有墨西哥的姓，但是我不會以貌取人的，你知道嗎？

sentences.english: Fifthly, insist on reasonable medical treatment to ensure serving army.
sentences.chinese: 堅持合理醫療，確保姓軍爲兵。

sentences.english: But the merry men preferred to call him Little John .
sentences.chinese: 但羅賓漢一夥把他的姓和名顛倒過來，改成了小約翰。

sentences.english: She may choose to use both her husband's last name and her last name, followed by her given name.
sentences.chinese: 她可以同時使用夫姓和孃家姓，然後接名字。
姓不姓蒙太古又有什麼關係呢？

sentences.english: Qing, thanks so much . This was even better than our wedding .
sentences.chinese: 姓秦的，謝謝你啊，辦的比我們結婚的時候都熱鬧。

sentences.english: Please call me Lois. First names are more friendly than last names.
sentences.chinese: 請叫我伊洛絲吧，稱呼名子比稱呼姓要更親切一些。

definition: family name
two-character surname such as 司馬|司马 or 諸葛|诸葛
Han surname/Chinese surname
to bestow a surname (of emperor conferring favor on ethnic group)
pet name for a child/childhood name
literary name (an alternative name of a person stressing a moral principle)/courtesy name
renowned/a great name
taboo name (e.g. of emperor)
descendant
to avoid mentioning/taboo word/name of deceased emperor or superior
five hundred years ago we were the same family (idiom) (said of persons with the same surname)
pinyin: wu3 bai3 nian2 qian2 shi4 yi1 jia1

anyone/Mr Average/any Tom, Dick or Harry
